index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL AND HEALTH SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Human Resources; authorizing application for and agreement with the Washington State Department of Social and Health Services for financial assistance under the Senior Citizens Services Act of 1976, authorizing the execution of agreements for the provision of services to the elderly, establishing certain positions in the Department of Human Resources, increasing expenditure allowances in the 1976 Budget of said Department, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring an Emergency therefor.
